key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including failed Baidu deal and app store removals
Dependence on the Chinese market and vulnerability to economic slowdowns
Revenue uncertainty due to Bigo Live's removal and competitive pressures in short video market
controversies: Failed $3.6 billion Baidu deal due to antitrust and data privacy concerns
Bigo Live app removal from major app stores over regulatory or content moderation issues
Allegations of inflated user metrics and securities fraud lawsuit
social_issues: Inadequate content moderation leading to misinformation, inappropriate content, and cyberbullying
Reputational risks from bot allegations and user trust concerns
governance_issues: Heightened regulatory scrutiny and geopolitical risks in international markets
Effectiveness of announced safety and compliance measures remains uncertain
